top5.title: AI Agent Crypto Wallet Integration
top5.description: AI agents cannot easily transact crypto autonomously. Current solutions (x402) have seen declining volume. Need for simple, secure agent-to-agent payments.
top5.recommendedAction: Build "AgentWallet" - simple SDK for AI agents to hold and transact crypto with spending limits and audit trails.
top5.estimatedImpact: $10M-100M+ if adopted by major agent platforms

top5.title: Southeast Asia DeFi Infrastructure
top5.description: Vietnam, Philippines, and Indonesia show top-tier crypto adoption (Chainalysis Index) but lack localized DeFi infrastructure. High remittance volume + mobile-first population = massive opportunity.
top5.recommendedAction: Partner with local payment processors (GCash, Dana) for crypto on/off ramps. Build mobile-first DeFi dashboard targeting remittance savings.

top5.title: MiCA Compliance as a Service
top5.description: EU MiCA regulation fully active 2025. Crypto businesses need compliance tools for CASP licensing, travel rule, and stablecoin reserves.
top5.recommendedAction: Build MiCA compliance toolkit: KYC/AML automation, travel rule integration, audit trail reporting.

top5.title: US Stablecoin Infrastructure (GENIUS Act)
top5.description: GENIUS Act passed 2025 creates federal framework for stablecoins. Banks and fintechs need infrastructure to issue and manage compliant stablecoins.
top5.recommendedAction: Build "Stripe for Stablecoins" - white-label stablecoin issuance and management for banks/fintechs.
top5.estimatedImpact: $10M-100M+ ARR if adopted by regional banks

top5.title: Latin America Crypto Payroll
top5.description: Argentina, Brazil, and Mexico face currency devaluation. Remote workers increasingly demand crypto payment options. Existing solutions are fragmented and expensive.
top5.recommendedAction: Build "Stripe for Crypto Payroll" - simple API for companies to pay LATAM contractors in stablecoins.
